issue.title: [Python/C++] Decimal test failure on MSVC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-885](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-885). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is the last remaining item to enable running the pyarrow test suite locally. Appveyor issues may have to wait until post 0.3 so they can be further diagnosed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-885?focusedCommentId=15990078) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Duplicate of ARROW-914
